products.name: Acrylic dispersion for interior paints
products.description: KAZ CHEMICALS AD-30I is a universal acrylic dispersion for the production of high-quality water-based interior paints. It provides excellent hiding power, smooth application, and forms a durable matte film with good wet scrub resistance. An environmentally friendly product with low volatile organic compound (VOC) content.

products.name: Acrylic dispersion for exterior paints
products.description: KAZ CHEMICALS AD-45F is a highly weather-resistant acrylic dispersion developed for exterior paints and protective coatings. It exhibits exceptional resistance to UV radiation, temperature fluctuations, and moisture, ensuring long-term durability and color retention of façades.

products.name: Universal dispersion for deep-penetration primers
products.description: KAZ CHEMICALS AD-25G is a specialized dispersion for producing strengthening and adhesion-promoting deep-penetration primers. It effectively binds dust, reinforces weak substrates, and significantly improves adhesion of subsequent finishing layers.

products.name: Elastic dispersion for crack-resistant coatings
products.description: KAZ CHEMICALS AD-60E is a highly elastic acrylic dispersion for formulations requiring compensation of substrate movement. It is used in crack-resistant putties, sealants, and elastic paints for expansion joints and problematic surfaces.

products.name: Dispersion for washable paints
products.description: KAZ CHEMICALS AD-75W is a dispersion for producing paints with enhanced resistance to washing and abrasion. It forms a dense, durable film capable of withstanding repeated wet cleaning with detergents. Ideal for kitchens, bathrooms, and corridors.

products.name: Matte dispersion for velvet-effect paints
products.description: KAZ CHEMICALS AD-20M is a specialized dispersion for producing paints with a deep matte or velvet effect. It provides a refined appearance of the coating, masks minor surface imperfections, and features very low light reflection.

products.name: Gloss-effect dispersion
products.description: KAZ CHEMICALS AD-85G is a dispersion designed for the production of high- and medium-gloss paints. It forms a smooth, dense film with rich color and excellent light reflectance. Easy to clean.

products.name: Thixotropic dispersion for vertical surfaces
products.description: KAZ CHEMICALS AD-15T is a thixotropic dispersion that prevents sagging on vertical surfaces. It allows increased layer thickness without runs and is ideal for textured paints, anti-rust coatings, and formulations for uneven substrates.

products.name: Fast-drying dispersion
products.description: KAZ CHEMICALS AD-50R is a dispersion with accelerated drying time. It reduces technological pauses between coats and increases productivity. Suitable for fast-repair systems and application at reduced temperatures.

products.name: Super frost-resistant dispersion
products.description: KAZ CHEMICALS AD-90S is a specialized dispersion with an extremely low film-forming temperature. It maintains elasticity and adhesion at very low temperatures and is intended for paints and protective coatings in cold climates, cold-storage facilities, and outdoor structures.

products.name: Dispersion with biocidal protection
products.description: KAZ CHEMICALS AD-65B is a dispersion containing biocidal components to protect coatings from mold, algae, and fungal growth. Recommended for humid areas, north-facing façades, and food-industry facilities.

products.name: Low-VOC dispersion
products.description: KAZ CHEMICALS AD-55V is an environmentally friendly dispersion with ultra-low volatile organic compound content (<5 g/L). It complies with strict environmental standards (ECOLABEL, Blue Angel) and is intended for green paints used in childcare, healthcare facilities, and eco-friendly projects.

products.name: High-adhesion dispersion
products.description: KAZ CHEMICALS AD-70A is a dispersion with a modified chemical structure providing outstanding adhesion to difficult substrates such as plastics (PVC, polypropylene), metals (including galvanized steel), glass, and old glossy coatings.

products.name: Concentrated dispersion
products.description: KAZ CHEMICALS AD-10C is a highly concentrated acrylic dispersion (solids content approx. 65%). It reduces transportation and storage costs and serves as an economical base for producing a wide range of paints and coatings with adjustable properties after dilution.

products.name: Dispersion for protective and decorative wood impregnations
products.description: KAZ CHEMICALS AD-80P is a dispersion specifically developed for wood impregnations and stains. It penetrates deeply into the wood structure, enhances grain appearance, and provides protection against moisture, UV radiation, and biological damage while preserving breathability.

products.name: HPMC for general-purpose construction mixes
products.description: KAZ CHEMICALS HPMC-100M is a medium-viscosity hydroxypropyl methylcellulose used as a universal thickener and water-retention agent for plasters, putties, and masonry mortars. It provides good workability and prevents segregation.

products.name: HPMC for thin-layer formulations
products.description: KAZ CHEMICALS HPMC-75T is a medium-viscosity HPMC optimized for thin-layer plasters, putties, and tile adhesives. It provides high plasticity, improved application, and prevents sagging on vertical surfaces.

products.name: HPMC for self-leveling floors
products.description: KAZ CHEMICALS HPMC-40F is a low-viscosity HPMC for self-leveling compounds. It controls viscosity and rheology, ensures good flow without filler sedimentation, and forms a smooth surface.

products.name: HPMC for adhesive formulations
products.description: KAZ CHEMICALS HPMC-60K is designed for dry construction adhesives (tile adhesives, block adhesives, mounting adhesives). It provides extended open time, good thixotropy, enhanced adhesion, and ease of application.

products.name: Modified HPMC for heavy tiles and stone
products.description: KAZ CHEMICALS HPMC-90H is a high-viscosity modified HPMC for adhesives intended for large-format porcelain tiles and natural stone. It provides high load-bearing capacity, strong bond strength, and prevents tile slippage.

products.name: HPMC for paints and coatings
products.description: KAZ CHEMICALS HPMC-15L is a low-viscosity HPMC used as a thickener and stabilizer in water-dispersed paints and primers. It provides the required consistency, prevents spattering, and inhibits pigment sedimentation.

products.name: HPMC for delayed water absorption systems
products.description: KAZ CHEMICALS HPMC-120S features extended hydration time and delayed water absorption. It is intended for hot climates or highly absorbent substrates and helps maintain workability for longer periods.

products.name: Fast-dissolving HPMC
products.description: KAZ CHEMICALS HPMC-50R is a modified fast-dissolving HPMC that does not form lumps when mixed with water. It accelerates mortar preparation and simplifies production processes.

products.name: High-viscosity HPMC
products.description: KAZ CHEMICALS HPMC-200H is a high-viscosity HPMC for systems requiring exceptional water retention and thixotropy. It is used in thick paste-like putties, repair compounds, and joint grouts.

products.name: HPMC for decorative plasters
products.description: KAZ CHEMICALS HPMC-25D is optimized for textured decorative plasters ("bark beetle", "pebble finish"). It provides good plasticity, retains fillers, and enables easy texture formation.

products.name: HPMC for masonry and mounting mortars
products.description: KAZ CHEMICALS HPMC-80C is intended for mortars requiring high water retention and good workability. It improves adhesion to bricks and blocks and prevents premature dehydration.

products.name: HPMC with enhanced water retention
products.description: KAZ CHEMICALS HPMC-55W is modified to provide extremely high water retention. It is intended for highly porous substrates such as aerated concrete and for application under low ambient humidity conditions.

products.name: HPMC for gypsum-based systems
products.description: KAZ CHEMICALS HPMC-30G is compatible with gypsum binders. It delays gypsum setting, improves plasticity, and prevents segregation in gypsum plasters and putties.

products.name: HPMC for foamed concrete mixes
products.description: KAZ CHEMICALS HPMC-65P stabilizes foam in foamed concrete mixtures. It promotes uniform porous structure formation and prevents settling and collapse of air bubbles.

products.name: HPMC for exterior plasters and putties
products.description: KAZ CHEMICALS HPMC-110F is a high-viscosity HPMC for exterior thin- and thick-layer systems. It provides improved crack resistance, good thixotropy, and effective water retention for outdoor applications.

products.name: Universal dispersing and wetting agent DD-101
products.description: DD-101 is a polycarboxylate-based surfactant designed for efficient dispersion and wetting of inorganic pigments (titanium dioxide, iron oxides, talc, calcium carbonate) and fillers in water-based paints and construction mixes. It reduces dispersion time and improves color strength and storage stability.

products.name: Dispersant for organic pigments DD-202
products.description: DD-202 is a specialized dispersant for organic pigments (phthalocyanines, azo pigments) and carbon black in water-based coating systems. It features high adsorption capacity and prevents reflocculation and pigment sedimentation, ensuring bright and clean shades.

characteristics.Solubility: Soluble in water and water-alcohol mixtures

products.name: Polyurethane-based thickener ZG-205
products.description: ZG-205 is a non-ionic associative polyurethane (HEUR) thickener for water-dispersed paints and enamels. It provides strong pseudoplastic rheology (thixotropy), excellent flow and leveling, and prevents spattering and sagging on vertical surfaces.

products.name: Rheology modifier MR-88
products.description: MR-88 is a universal rheology modifier for construction mixes (plasters, putties, self-leveling floors) based on cellulose ethers. It ensures optimal water absorption, workability, extends open time, and prevents segregation.

products.name: Broad-spectrum biocide BD-05
products.description: BD-05 is a combined isothiazolinone-based biocide for protecting water-based paints, adhesives, and construction mixes against bacteria, yeasts, and molds both in-can and in the dry film after application.

products.name: Preservative for construction mixes CS-10
products.description: CS-10 is an effective bronopol-based preservative for protecting water-based dry construction mixes against microbiological spoilage during storage and after mixing with water. It is active against bacteria and fungi and increases product shelf life.

products.name: Antifreeze additive AF-15
products.description: AF-15 is a glycol-based antifreeze additive for water-based paints and construction mixes, allowing application at reduced temperatures (down to −5°C). It lowers the freezing point of the aqueous phase, preventing emulsion damage and ensuring proper film formation.

products.name: Water-reducing plasticizer WR-20
products.description: WR-20 is a new-generation superplasticizer based on polycarboxylate polymers for cement-based construction mixes. It significantly reduces water demand (up to 25%), increasing strength, density, and frost resistance without loss of workability.

products.name: Foaming additive PA-30
products.description: PA-30 is a foaming additive based on proteins and synthetic surfactants for producing lightweight cellular concretes (foam concrete, aerated concrete) and thermal plasters. It обеспечивает stable, uniform closed-cell porous structure with low density.

products.name: Flame-retardant additive AP-25
products.description: AP-25 is a fire-retardant additive based on phosphorus–nitrogen compounds for water-based paints, varnishes, and coatings. Upon heating, it forms an inert expanded carbonaceous layer that insulates the surface from heat and oxygen, slowing flame propagation.

products.name: Anticorrosive additive AC-40
products.description: AC-40 is a pigmentary anticorrosive additive based on zinc phosphate for primers and paints applied to ferrous metals. It passivates the metal surface by forming an insoluble protective layer and acts as a cathodic corrosion inhibitor.

products.name: UV stabilizer UV-50
products.description: UV-50 is a combined light stabilizer (HALS + UV absorber) for polymer materials, paints and coatings, and construction mixes exposed to solar radiation. It slows photo-oxidative degradation, preventing yellowing, cracking, and loss of mechanical properties.

products.name: Defoamer OE-60
products.description: OE-60 is a silicone-based defoamer for water-based systems (paints, adhesives, construction mixes). It efficiently destroys existing foam and prevents its reformation during production, application, and service life.

products.name: Adhesion promoter AD-70
products.description: AD-70 is a silane-based adhesion promoter with functional groups for improving adhesion of coatings (paints, primers, adhesives) to difficult non-absorbent substrates such as glass, metal, plastics (PVC, polycarbonate), and glazed ceramics.

products.name: Elasticizing plasticizer EL-80
products.description: EL-80 is a redispersible polymer powder (vinyl acetate–ethylene copolymer) for cement-based construction mixes. It improves elasticity, impact resistance, and adhesion, reduces modulus of elasticity, and minimizes crack formation.

products.name: Hydrophobic additive SH-90
products.description: SH-90 is a silicone-based hydrophobic additive formulated with silanes and siloxanes to impart water-repellent properties to construction materials such as concrete, brick, plaster, and wood. It reduces water absorption and improves frost resistance and biological durability.

products.name: Abrasion-resistant additive AB-55
products.description: AB-55 is an additive based on finely dispersed quartz and corundum for improving wear resistance and hardness of self-leveling floors, industrial coatings, and protective layers. It increases resistance to abrasion, scratching, and impact loads.

products.name: Setting accelerator TC-22
products.description: TC-22 is a setting and hardening accelerator based on calcium aluminate and carbonates for cement-based construction mixes. It significantly reduces initial and final setting times, enabling rapid load application and work under time-constrained conditions.

products.name: Coloring paste CL-33
products.description: CL-33 is a highly concentrated universal water-based coloring paste for mass tinting of dry construction mixes (plasters, grouts, self-leveling floors) as well as water-dispersed paints. It offers high dispersibility and color strength and does not affect the primary properties of the material.
